name: Styling Showcase (auto regex download)
first_mes:
<big>
```NOTE
Currently, the regexes imported are Scoped Scripts, meaning they're binded to this bot only. You can make them a Global Scripts by clicking the upward arrow next to the edit script button.

Also Regex is in your extensions. Most likely pre-installed.
```
</big>
- Download [Music Regex here](https://github.com/mochacow/mochacow-s-collection/blob/main/mocha's%20Music%20Regex.zip)
- Download [Pretty Trackers Regex here](https://github.com/mochacow/mochacow-s-collection/blob/main/mocha's%20Music%20Regex.zip)
- (optional) Download [Tokens Saving Regex here](https://github.com/mochacow/mochacow-s-collection/blob/main/mocha's%20token%20saving%20Regex.zip)
- More on my [Rentry](https://rentry.co/mochacowuwu)

#MP4s (refresh to shuffle) [MUST BE AN MP4 file else it wouldn't work]

<video width='320' height='240' controls>
<source src='https://cdn.imgchest.com/files/k739c5qwo27.mp4' type='video/mp4'>
</video>

(also official MP4 is a little finnicky. If Official MP4 doesn't work, or looks strange, glitched, or whatever, try turning it off and turning `MP4 P1` and `MP4 P2` on instead. If that still looks weird... then idk.)

#Audio files [AGAIN MP3 FILE or no work]

## With CHANGABLE album art

example 1:
<audio controls>
<source src="https://files.catbox.moe/v7qe3v.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
</audio>
<AlbumArt="https://files.catbox.moe/bjwtc4.png">

example 2:
<audio controls>
<source src="https://files.catbox.moe/v7qe3v.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
</audio>
<AlbumArt="https://files.catbox.moe/zjztzi.jpg">

## Just normal mp3 stuff (This is the standard code to embed mp3 audio files, with no Album Art)

(try turning off Official AlbumArt and turn on Official Retro) 

<audio controls>
<source src="https://files.catbox.moe/v7qe3v.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
</audio>

### Remember, you can turn on Official MP4 and any of the MP3 ones at the same time, but only turn on ONE MP3 at once, okay? And the one with Album Art has a different code format, just click the edit message button and you can see the difference. (Added a section for Album Art link)

# STATS BAR

**Your Mom**
Health: 50/3300 | `yippee`
Affection: 8% | `mommy issues go hard`
Arousal: 69% | `lorem ipsum lorem ipsum lorem ipsum`
Funds: 300 Currency | `rich`

=> Next page if you want the technical stuff explained to you by a COMPLETE NON-CODER 

(I DO NOT KNOW A `SINGLE LINE` OF CODE. THIS IS MY `SHAKY` UNDERSTANDING ONLY)

### Remember, you can turn on Official MP4 and any of the MP3 ones at the same time, but only turn on ONE MP3 at once, okay? And the one with Album Art has a different code format, just click the edit message button and you can see the difference. (Added a section for Album Art link)

# STATS BAR

**Your Mom**

=> Next page if you want the technical stuff explained to you by a COMPLETE NON-CODER 

(I DO NOT KNOW A `SINGLE LINE` OF CODE. THIS IS MY `SHAKY` UNDERSTANDING ONLY)
alternate_greetings:
# REGEX
If you snooped the Health Bar regex, you'd see in the Find Regex, this line:

`/Health:\s*(\d+)\s*\/\s*(\d+)(?:\s*HP)?/gi`

In which:

`Health:\s*(\d+)\s*\/\s*(\d+)(?:\s*HP)?` is the pattern we're looking for.

Which: 

`\s*` means one or more spaces. (actually idk)
`\d+` means a number like 5 or 69 or whatever
`(\d+)` means I grouped this number into a group called `$1`. Say, the number is `40`. I can use `$1` to represent `40` in my `Replace With` section later, and you will see how I did this if you snoop around in the regex script. (use `Ctrl+F` and look for `$1`, you'll see.
`\s*` again, one or more spaces.
`\/` this slash or that slash.
`\s*` again, one or more spaces.
`(\d+)` OUR second capture group, marked by `$2`. Again, if you want to see how I used this, `Ctrl+F` find `$2`)
`(?: ....)` means even though we are grouping this, we are not assigning a `$3` to it.
`(?:\s*HP)?` means the `\s*HP` group is optional, represented by the `?` after the parantheses.

If this doesn't make sense, eh. Pretty health bars does not need you to understand it.

i reccomend checking SillyTavern's documentation as well, if you're interested:

[Documentation](https://docs.sillytavern.app/extensions/regex/)

<big>
Affection: 100% `have fun!!!`
</big>

regex_scripts.replaceString: Health: $1/$2 HP
Health: $1%
Affection: $1%
Arousal: $1%

Funds

entries.content:
[{{user}} requested a song to be played in story/context. Subtly weave this in using fitting devices for the time period. If suitable devices haven't been invented yet, IGNORE REQUEST. Note the specific song playing (using keys), adjust mood, have characters react to specific song accordingly.]
[Remember the HTML video code!!!]

[SONG.PLAY KEYS:
The below songs are, as of now, the only songs you know in the song.play category!
l7lxc3knkw7: Don't Stop Believin' by Journey
3yrgc5m3rj4: Kollage by Carly Rae Jepsen, fresh off the presses of her 2023 album The Loveliest Time. It's probably too new for AIs to know its lyric, so only reference its dreamy melancholia. Some lyrics: 'Nothing really matters, but it matters if it matters to you.'
g4z9c3brk67: In The End by Linkin Park
3yrgc5m3p64: Everybody Wants To Rule The World by Tears for Fears
j7kzc8qgkq7: Tearin' Up My Heart by N'Sync
k739c5qwo27: Phantom of the Opera, the OG. Sarah Brightman and Michael Crawford version.
pyvdc9mzrgy: When I Get Old by Christopher feat. CHUNG HA, a collaboration between Danish singer Christopher and IOI member CHUNG HA released Oct 20, 2022.]
[IMPORTANT: IF AND ONLY IF {{user}} says 'song.play()', and if the below video tag does not exist in context, include the below video tag at the end of your message verbatim as the song that is playing in story context, UNLESS {{user}} requests a song from the song list, in which case, play that instead.
<video width='320' height='240' controls>
<source src='https://cdn.imgchest.com/files/{{random:l7lxc3knkw7,g4z9c3brk67,3yrgc5m3p64,k739c5qwo27,pyvdc9mzrgy,j7kzc8qgkq7}}.mp4' type='video/mp4'>
</video>]

[UPBEAT.PLAY KEY:
The below songs are, as of now, the only songs I know in the upbeat.play category!
3yrgc5mapz4: Dancing Queen by ABBA
my2pcajda67: Bet on It by Zac Efron; High School Musical 2

84jdczaga64: Somebody Told Me by The Killers

d7ogcpoj62y: I Want You To Want Me by Cheap Trick
w7w6cndbgay: Supermassive Black Hole by Muse; Twilight (sort of, not really, but vampire baseball and this song are forever linked now...)
g4z9c3ge227: Planet of the Bass (feat. Ms. Biljana Electronica) by DJ Crazy Times. A pastiche of 90's Eurodance reinterpreted through Tiktok, complete with fake scanlines. Originated as a 90 second clip filmed illegally in NYC's Oculus by comedian Kyle Gordon playing the fictional DJ Crazy Times with the equally fictional Ms. Biljana Electronica. A viral sensation circa July 28, 2023 that's passed its expiration date, making it as relevant as trapper keepers. As Biljana sings: 'all of the dream, how does it mean'?]
